languages.text: {n}Болезненно худой и изрядно аугментированный пустотнорожденный творит {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилу{/g}, едва вас завидев.{/n} "Ваша Светлость! Молюсь за вас Императору каждый день!" {n}У него неожиданно бодрый и громкий голос — просто удивительно, что это тщедушное тело способно издавать нечто подобное.{/n}

{n}A morbidly thin and heavily augmented voidborn makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} the moment he sees you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I pray to the Emperor for you every day!" {n}His voice is unexpectedly energetic and loud. It is hard to believe that such a puny body could produce such a vigorous sound.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Болезненно худой и изрядно аугментированный пустотнорожденный творит {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилу{/g}, едва вас завидев.{/n} "Ваша Светлость! Молюсь за вас Императору каждый день!" {n}У него неожиданно бодрый и громкий голос — просто удивительно, что это тщедушное тело способно издавать нечто подобное.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A morbidly thin and heavily augmented voidborn makes the sign of the Aquila the moment he sees you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I pray to the Emperor for you every day!" {n}His voice is unexpectedly cheerful and loud. It is amazing that such a puny body can produce such a boisterous sound.{/n}

I pray to the Emperor for you every day!" {n}His voice is unexpectedly energetic and loud. It is hard to believe that such a puny body could produce such a vigorous sound.{/n}

I pray to the Emperor for you every day!" {n}His voice is unexpectedly energetic and loud. It is hard to believe that such a puny body could produce such a vigorous sound.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein morbide dünnes und schwer augmentiertes Kind der Leere macht das Zeichen des {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g}, sobald er Euch sieht.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich bete jeden Tag für Euch zum Imperator!" {n}Seine Stimme ist unerwartet kräftig und laut. Es ist schwer zu glauben, dass so ein schwächlicher Körper derart energische Töne hervorbringt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A morbidly thin and heavily augmented voidborn makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} the moment he sees you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I pray to the Emperor for you every day!" {n}His voice is unexpectedly energetic and loud. It is hard to believe that such a puny body could produce such a vigorous sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein morbide dünnes und schwer augmentiertes Kind der Leere macht das Zeichen des Adlers, sobald er Euch sieht.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich bete jeden Tag für Euch zum Imperator!" {n}Seine Stimme ist unerwartet kräftig und laut. Es ist schwer zu glauben, dass so ein schwächlicher Körper derart energische Töne hervorbringt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un nacido en el vacío grotescamente raquítico y con multitud de aumentos hace el signo del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} en cuanto te ve.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Rezo al Emperador por usted todos los días!». {n}Su voz te resulta inesperadamente sonora y enérgica. Cuesta creer que un cuerpo tan frágil pueda producir un sonido tan vigoroso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A morbidly thin and heavily augmented voidborn makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} the moment he sees you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I pray to the Emperor for you every day!" {n}His voice is unexpectedly energetic and loud. It is hard to believe that such a puny body could produce such a vigorous sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un nacido en el vacío grotescamente raquítico y con multitud de aumentos hace el signo del Aquila en cuanto te ve.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Rezo al Emperador por usted todos los días!». {n}Su voz te resulta inesperadamente sonora y enérgica. Cuesta creer que un cuerpo tan frágil pueda producir un sonido tan vigoroso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}病的に痩せこけてオーグメントをビッシリ付けた虚空生まれが、こちらを見た瞬間に{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラの印{/g}を結ぶ。{/n}「陛下！あなたのために、毎日皇帝に祈っております！」{n}男の声は思いのほか元気で大きい。こんなちっぽけな体からこんな威勢のいい声が出るとは信じがたい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A morbidly thin and heavily augmented voidborn makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} the moment he sees you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I pray to the Emperor for you every day!" {n}His voice is unexpectedly energetic and loud. It is hard to believe that such a puny body could produce such a vigorous sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}病的に痩せこけてオーグメントをビッシリ付けた虚空生まれが、こちらを見た瞬間にアクィラの印を結ぶ。{/n}「陛下！あなたのために、毎日皇帝に祈っております！」{n}男の声は思いのほか元気で大きい。こんなちっぽけな体からこんな威勢のいい声が出るとは信じがたい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}在看到你的那一刻，这位看起来孱弱不堪、浑身上下到处都是植入物的虚空之子向你做了个{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰手势{/g}。{/n}“大人！我每天都为您向神皇祈祷！”{n}出乎意料的是，他的声音非常有力、嘹亮，很难想象他孱弱的身体居然能发出如此铿锵的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A morbidly thin and heavily augmented voidborn makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} the moment he sees you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I pray to the Emperor for you every day!" {n}His voice is unexpectedly energetic and loud. It is hard to believe that such a puny body could produce such a vigorous sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在看到你的那一刻，这位看起来孱弱不堪、浑身上下到处都是植入物的虚空之子向你做了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“大人！我每天都为您向神皇祈祷！”{n}出乎意料的是，他的声音非常有力、嘹亮，很难想象他孱弱的身体居然能发出如此铿锵的声音。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un hors-monde aux nombreux augmétiques et à la maigreur cadavérique s'empresse de faire le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} dès qu'il vous aperçoit.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Je prie chaque jour l'Empereur pour votre sauvegarde ! » {n}Sa voix est étonnamment énergique et puissante pour un individu aussi chétif.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A morbidly thin and heavily augmented voidborn makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} the moment he sees you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I pray to the Emperor for you every day!" {n}His voice is unexpectedly energetic and loud. It is hard to believe that such a puny body could produce such a vigorous sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un enfant du vide aux nombreux augmétiques et à la maigreur cadavérique s'empresse de faire le signe de l'Aquila dès qu'il vous aperçoit.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Je prie chaque jour l'Empereur pour votre sauvegarde ! » {n}Sa voix est étonnamment énergique et puissante pour un individu aussi chétif.{/n}

{n}Un hors-monde aux nombreux augmétiques et à la maigreur cadavérique s'empresse de faire le signe de l'Aquila dès qu'il vous aperçoit.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Je prie chaque jour l'Empereur pour votre sauvegarde ! » {n}Sa voix est étonnamment énergique et puissante pour un individu aussi chétif.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hastalıklı derecede ince ve yoğun bir şekilde ogmentlerle kaplı uçsuzdoğan seni görür görmez {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} işareti yapıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sizin için her gün İmparator'a dua ediyorum!" {n}Sesi beklenmedik derecede enerjik ve yüksek. Bu kadar çelimsiz bir bedenden bu derece coşkulu bir ses çıkabilmesine inanmak güç.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A morbidly thin and heavily augmented voidborn makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} the moment he sees you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I pray to the Emperor for you every day!" {n}His voice is unexpectedly energetic and loud. It is hard to believe that such a puny body could produce such a vigorous sound.{/n}
